content:
UpdateUnit Enum

Definition

Specifies the units for the update interval.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)]
public enum UpdateUnit
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
UpdateUnit

Fields

Days

Update interval is in days.
Hours

Update interval is in hours.
Weeks

Update interval is in weeks.
